pages.text: Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Ō fushin-sha-tachi yo
watashi wa, anata gata ga agameru mono o agamenai
Anata gata wa, watashi ga agameru mono o, agameru-sha-tachide wanai
Watashi wa, anata gata ga agamete kita mono no, sūhai-shade wanai
Anata gata wa, watashi ga agamete kita mono no, sūhai-shade wanai
Anata gata ni wa, anata gata no shūkyō ga ari, watashi ni wa, watashi no shūkyō ga aru nodearu
Arrā no enjo to shōri ga kite
hitobito ga mure o nashite arrā no oshie (isurāmu) ni hairu no o mitara
anata no omo no eikō o home tatae, mata o yurushi o koe. Hontōni kare wa, tabitabi yurusa reru okatadearu
Abū rahabu no ryōte wa horobi, kare mo horobite shimae
Kare no tomi mo mōketa kin mo, kare no tame ni yakudachi wa shinai
Yagate kare wa, moesakaru honō no gōka no naka de yaka reyou
Kare no tsuma wa sono maki o hakobu
kubi ni shuro no aranawa kakete
